org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies

类 AbstractConfigurableFederationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.AbstractConfigurableFederationPolicy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ConfigurableFederationPolicy
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractAMRMProxyPolicy, AbstractRouterPolicy

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurableFederationPolicy
extends Object
implements ConfigurableFederationPolicy
    Base abstract class for a weighted ConfigurableFederationPolicy.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reinitialize

        public void reinitialize(FederationPolicyInitializationContext initializationContext)
                  throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        从接口复制的说明: ConfigurableFederationPolicy
        This method is invoked to initialize of update the configuration of policies. The implementor should provide try-n-swap semantics, and retain state if possible.
        指定者:
        reinitialize 在接口中 ConfigurableFederationPolicy
        参数:
        initializationContext - the new context to provide to implementor.
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - in case the initialization fails.

      • validate

        public void validate(WeightedPolicyInfo newPolicyInfo)
              throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        Overridable validation step for the policy configuration.
        参数:
        newPolicyInfo - the configuration to test.
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - if the configuration is not valid.

      • getIsDirty

        public boolean getIsDirty()
        Returns true whether the last reinitialization requires actual changes, or was "free" as the weights have not changed. This is used by subclasses overriding reinitialize and calling super.reinitialize() to know wheter to quit early.
        返回:
        whether more work is needed to initialize.

      • getPolicyInfo

        public WeightedPolicyInfo getPolicyInfo()
        Getter method for the configuration weights.
        返回:
        the WeightedPolicyInfo representing the policy configuration.

      • setPolicyInfo

        public void setPolicyInfo(WeightedPolicyInfo policyInfo)
        Setter method for the configuration weights.
        参数:
        policyInfo - the WeightedPolicyInfo representing the policy configuration.

      • getPolicyContext

        public FederationPolicyInitializationContext getPolicyContext()
        Getter method for the FederationPolicyInitializationContext.
        返回:
        the context for this policy.

      • setPolicyContext

        public void setPolicyContext(FederationPolicyInitializationContext policyContext)
        Setter method for the FederationPolicyInitializationContext.
        参数:
        policyContext - the context to assign to this policy.

      • getActiveSubclusters

        protected Map<SubClusterId,SubClusterInfo> getActiveSubclusters()
                                                         throws org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException
        This methods gets active subclusters map from the FederationStateStoreFacade and validate it not being null/empty.
        返回:
        the map of ids to info for all active subclusters.
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException - if we can't get the list.
